actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Hazardous Substance Act to make aerosol containers which contain fluorocarbons banned hazardous substances.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Hazardous Substances Act to ban as hazardous substances all aerosol containing fluorocarbons.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Hazardous Substance Act to make aerosol containers which contain fluorocarbons banned hazardous substances.
